description: This document is the master architectural map of the ColorCopiesUSA.com website. It defines the key sections, knowledge hubs, and product categories for AI use in generating interconnected schema.

main_pages.name: Homepage
main_pages.description: The main entry point of the website.

main_pages.name: About Us Page
main_pages.description: Information about the company's history, team, and mission.

main_pages.name: Contact Us Page
main_pages.description: Provides contact information, hours, and address.

knowledge_base.name: Printing Academy 101
knowledge_base.description: The primary pillar page for all educational content, tutorials, and guides.

knowledge_base.name: Printing Insights Blog
knowledge_base.description: The company blog, featuring articles on industry trends, tips, and announcements.

main_product_list_page.name: All Products
main_product_list_page.description: A comprehensive list of all products and services offered.

product_categories.name: Binding Services Hub
product_categories.description: The main category page for all booklet and book binding options.

product_categories.name: Envelope Hub
product_categories.description: The main category page for all envelope products.

product_categories.name: Postcard & Flyer Hub
product_categories.description: The main category page for all postcard and flyer products.

support_pages.name: Customer Reviews Page
support_pages.description: A collection of testimonials and reviews from clients.

support_pages.name: Help & FAQ Page
support_pages.description: Answers to common questions about accounts, shipping, and services.
